examples.example: 通过不断学习和努力，他的专业水平有了很大的提高。

translate.english: Through continuous learning and hard work, his professional level has been greatly improved.

examples.example: 他在绘画方面展现出了很高的水平，每一幅作品都让人赞叹不已。

translate.english: He has shown a very high level in painting, and every work makes people amazed.

examples.example: 他的厨艺水平堪称一流，做出来的美食让人赞不绝口。

translate.english: His cooking skill can be regarded as first-class, and the delicacies he makes are highly praised.
